summary: AN ORDINANCE adding new Sections 15.48.100 - 15.48.130 to the Seattle Municipal Code to prohibit the posting of handbills, signs or posters upon any utility poles, traffic control devices, lamp posts, City structures or publicly-owned trees or shrubbery, to allow recovery of the cost of removal from any person responsible for their placement, and to establish certain presumptions to assist in the their collection; and adding a new section 15.50.050 to provide a civil penalty therefor.
